title: Chargers-Raiders TNF Recap: Marcus Mariota almost saves the season and evaluating Anthony Lynn's lack of job security (Football 12/18)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech link up for the final Thursday night recap of 2020, as the TNF slate ended on a high with an exciting overtime finish. The Chargers beat the Raiders 30-27 in OT as Wilson's preseason bold prediction that Marcus Mariota would replace Derek Carr and lead Las Vegas to the playoffs looked salvageable. It wasn't meant to be as Justin Herbert likely solidified the Rookie of the Year award with a standout performance in primetime. Do the Raiders have a quarterback controversy brewing already? Coaching is a big focus of this episode as Anthony Lynn won, but didn't do much to quiet hot seat rumors. Jon Gruden signed a 10-year deal a few years back, but Breech doesn't find it crazy to question if he's the right guy to finish out seasons.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
